name: Talk Juliet 1
_source: s;Juliet;I don't really miss this type of work.{w}{br}Cleaning up after messy nobles and all that.
s;Simon;What do you think happened?{w}{br}That's a mess.

s;Juliet;Oh, I've seen worse.{w}{br}When Luther and Vincent would drink, they'd nearly destroy the main hall.{w}{br}But the servants said Morrissey invited influential merchants to the castle last night.{w}{br}And they clearly got carried away.
s;Simon;How'd the merchants even get here?{w}{br}With monsters roaming everywhere, I can't imagine making the journey just to party.
s;Juliet;The lands around here seem pretty well protected.{w}{br}Morrissey probably wanted to keep the trade routes secure.
s;Juliet;He seems like the guy who can't live without imported wine.
s;Simon;Shhhh. Don't speak so loudly!{w}{br}At this rate, negotiations won't go well...
